summary: I AM WRITING TO COMPLAIN ABOUT THIN/WEAK WINDSHIELDS IN MY MINI COOPER S.  I AM ON MY THIRD WINDSHIELD IN LESS THAN A YEAR.  THE GLASS IS INCREDIBLY THIN AND CRACKS WITH THE SLIGHTEST IMPACT.  I CONSIDER THIS UNSAFE.  IN ADDITION I KNOW OF MANY PEOPLE WHO ARE HAVING THE SAME PROBLEM.   *NLM
